neighborhood_overview:
Charlestown is Boston's oldest neighborhood. You'll be minutes away from Bunker Hill Monument, Freedom Trail, Warren Tavern, USS Constitution, and more! Enjoy Harborwalk with phenomenal water views. Quick walk on Charlestown Bridge will take you to historic North End - Boston's Little Italy- with dozens of restaurants to choose from.¬†

description:
Be Unique & Kind with Sleepy Panda Homes! Located in Charlestown - Boston's oldest neighborhood - we are Boston's only eco, vegan & cruelty-free accommodations!¬† With a dining room, en-suite bathroom, 1850's floors, Globetrotter hosts 2 or families of 3-4.

Our historic and charming 1-BR is located at the bottom of the Bunker Hill with phenomenal Monument views. High ceilings, colonial bay windows, and restored 19th century wood floors accentuate the sun-filled parlor living room that can also function as sleeping quarters.
